/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it. On either side of the road, there are trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban greenery to the scene. The road itself is divided by a median, and a sidewalk runs parallel to it on the right side. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the gray of the road.
